text: Kate Middleton simply wore her most relatable outfit but. In honor Prince Harry and Meghan Markle ‘ s marriage ceremony, the Duchess Of Cambridge opted for an outfit she knew would stun viewers. She wore her tailor - made Alexander McQueen coat costume — a traditional garment she ’ s worn to a variety of royal engagements. At this time, she wore the off - white costume with a matching fascinator, stud earrings, Jimmy Choo pumps and a clutch, matching the extent of magnificence required for a royal marriage ceremony. It is also the proper outfit to put on to the event, as its understated compared to the Givenchy robe that Meghan wore down the aisle. There was no threat in stealing the highlight.
